description: Räven Lite Jacket is a lighter version of Fjällräven’s classic outdoor jacket from 1970. Made from light, airy G-1000 Air making it cool and comfortable in warm climates. Its hood can be folded into the collar and it has many practical pockets, including the characteristic bellows pockets with openings at the sides. A timeless everyday favourite that is just as suitable in the outdoors as in the city.
name: Fjallraven Raven Lite Jacket - Mens
